00001 #ifndef LOCKS_H
00002 #define LOCKS_H 1
00003 
00004 #include <pthread.h>
00005 
00006 namespace kvtest {
00007 
00011     class LockHolder {
00012     public:
00016         LockHolder(pthread_mutex_t *m) {
00017             mutex = m;
00018             if(pthread_mutex_lock(mutex) != 0) {
00019                 throw std::runtime_error("Failed to acquire lock.");
00020             }
00021         }
00022 
00026         ~LockHolder() {
00027             pthread_mutex_unlock(mutex);
00028         }
00029 
00030     private:
00031         pthread_mutex_t *mutex;
00032     };
00033 
00034 }
